verses.verse: <S%H1984>Boast<s%> not yourself of to <S%H4279>morrow;<s%> for you <S%H3045>know<s%> not <S%H4100>what<s%> a <S%H3117>day<s%> may <S%H3205>bring<s%> <S%H3205>forth.<s%>
Let <S%H2114>another<s%> man <S%H1984>praise<s%> you, and not your own <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> a <S%H5237>stranger,<s%> and not your own <S%H8193>lips.<s%>
A <S%H68>stone<s%> is <S%H3514>heavy,<s%> and the <S%H2344>sand<s%> <S%H5192>weighty;<s%> but a <S%H191>fool's<s%> <S%H3708>wrath<s%> is <S%H3513>heavier<s%> than them <S%H8147>both.<s%>
<S%H2534>Wrath<s%> is <S%H395>cruel,<s%> and <S%H639>anger<s%> is <S%H7858>outrageous;<s%> but <S%H4310>who<s%> is able to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7068>envy?<s%>
<S%H1540>Open<s%> <S%H8433>rebuke<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H5641>secret<s%> <S%H160>love.<s%>
<S%H539>Faithful<s%> are the <S%H6482>wounds<s%> of a <S%H157>friend;<s%> but the <S%H5390>kisses<s%> of an <S%H8130>enemy<s%> are <S%H6280>deceitful.<s%>

The <S%H7646>full<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H947>loathes<s%> an <S%H5317>honeycomb;<s%> but to the <S%H7456>hungry<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4751>bitter<s%> thing is <S%H4966>sweet.<s%>
As a <S%H6833>bird<s%> that <S%H5074>wanders<s%> from her <S%H7064>nest,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> is a <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H5074>wanders<s%> from his <S%H4725>place.<s%>

<S%H8081>Ointment<s%> and <S%H7004>perfume<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> the <S%H3820>heart:<s%> so does the <S%H4986>sweetness<s%> of a man's <S%H7453>friend<s%> by <S%H5315>hearty<s%> <S%H6098>counsel.<s%>

Your own <S%H7453>friend,<s%> and your <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H7453>friend,<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> not; <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H935>go<s%> into your <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of your <S%H343>calamity:<s%> for <S%H2896>better<s%> is a <S%H7934>neighbor<s%> that is <S%H7138>near<s%> than a <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H7350>far<s%> off.
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> be <S%H2449>wise,<s%> and make my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H8056>glad,<s%> that I may <S%H7725>answer<s%> <S%H1697><s%> him that <S%H2778>reproaches<s%> me.
A <S%H6175>prudent<s%> man <S%H7200>foresees<s%> the <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and <S%H5641>hides<s%> himself; but the <S%H6612>simple<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> on, and are <S%H6064>punished.<s%>
<S%H3947>Take<s%> his <S%H899>garment<s%> that is <S%H6148>surety<s%> for a <S%H2114>stranger,<s%> and <S%H2254>take<s%> a <S%H2254>pledge<s%> of him for a <S%H5237>strange<s%> woman.

He that <S%H1288>blesses<s%> his <S%H7453>friend<s%> with a <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice,<s%> <S%H7925>rising<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> it shall be <S%H2803>counted<s%> a <S%H7045>curse<s%> to him.
A <S%H2956>continual<s%> <S%H1812>dropping<s%> in a <S%H5464>very<s%> <S%H5464>rainy<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> and a <S%H4066>contentious<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> are <S%H7737>alike.<s%>
Whoever <S%H6845>hides<s%> her <S%H6845>hides<s%> the <S%H7307>wind,<s%> and the <S%H8081>ointment<s%> of his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand,<s%> which <S%H7121>denudes<s%> itself.
<S%H1270>Iron<s%> <S%H2300>sharpens<s%> <S%H1270>iron;<s%> so a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2300>sharpens<s%> the <S%H6440>countenance<s%> of his <S%H7453>friend.<s%>
Whoever <S%H5341>keeps<s%> the <S%H8384>fig<s%> tree shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> thereof: so he that <S%H8104>waits<s%> on his <S%H113>master<s%> shall be <S%H3513>honored.<s%>
As in <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> answers to <S%H6440>face,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> to <S%H120>man.<s%>
<S%H7585>Hell<s%> and <S%H10>destruction<s%> are <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H7646>full;<s%> so the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> are <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H7646>satisfied.<s%>
As the <S%H4715>fining<s%> <S%H4715>pot<s%> for <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and the <S%H3564>furnace<s%> for <S%H2091>gold;<s%> so is a <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H4110>praise.<s%>

<S%H518>Though<s%> you should <S%H3806>bray<s%> a <S%H191>fool<s%> in a <S%H4388>mortar<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H7383>wheat<s%> with a <S%H5940>pestle,<s%> yet will not his <S%H200>foolishness<s%> <S%H5493>depart<s%> from him.
Be you diligent to <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H6440>state<s%> of your <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> and <S%H7896>look<s%> well to your <S%H5739>herds.<s%>
For <S%H2633>riches<s%> are not for <S%H5769>ever:<s%> and does the <S%H5145>crown<s%> endure to every <S%H1755>generation?<s%>
The <S%H2682>hay<s%> <S%H1540>appears,<s%> and the tender <S%H1877>grass<s%> <S%H7200>shows<s%> itself, and <S%H6212>herbs<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> are <S%H622>gathered.<s%>
The <S%H3532>lambs<s%> are for your <S%H3830>clothing,<s%> and the <S%H6260>goats<s%> are the <S%H4242>price<s%> of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

And you shall have <S%H5795>goats'<s%> <S%H2461>milk<s%> <S%H1767>enough<s%> for your <S%H3899>food,<s%> for the <S%H3899>food<s%> of your <S%H1004>household,<s%> and for the <S%H2416>maintenance<s%> for your <S%H5291>maidens.<s%>
